oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Dark At The Top Of The Stairs - Eddy Arnold performance - 1958-08-05
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance of The Dark At The Top Of The Stairs, written by Tom Glazer, produced by Steve Sholes, recorded on August 5, 1958 at RCA Victor Studio in Manhattan, N.Y., and performed by Eddy Arnold (vocals), George Barnes (guitar), Al Casamenti (guitar), Lessberg (bass), Herbert Lovelle (drums), and Davie (piano). RCA master number J2WB-6119.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Eddy Arnold performs "The Dark At The Top Of The Stairs"
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: "The Dark At The Top Of The Stairs" sheet music [typed] stored with transcription documents, Box 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Glazer, Tom; Sholes, Stephen Henry; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Casamenti, Al; Lovelle, Herb; RCA Victor Records
